mapper.select: select PRO_ID, PRO_NAME_KO, PRO_MAJOR, PRO_LAB_TEL, PRO_LAB_NUM from professor where dept_code = #{deptCode}

select con.cons_num, pro.pro_id, pro.pro_name_ko, con.cons_date, con.cons_start, con.cons_end, con.cons_req_rsn, con.cons_status, con.cons_obj_rsn, con.cons_interview, con.cons_week from consult con, professor pro where pro.pro_id = con.pro_id and con.stu_id = #{stuId} order by con.cons_date desc, con.cons_start desc

select lrs.lrs_start, lrs.lrs_end, lrs.week_code from lecture l, professor p, lecture_room_schedule lrs where p.pro_id = l.pro_id and l.lec_code = lrs.lec_code and l.lec_open_year = 2023 and l.lec_open_semester = 1 and p.pro_id = #{proId}
select to_char(cons_date, 'MM/DD') as cons_date, cons_start, cons_end, cons_week from professor p, consult c where p.pro_id = c.pro_id and p.pro_id = #{proId}
mapper.insert: insert into consult (cons_num, pro_id, stu_id, cons_date, cons_start, cons_end, cons_req_rsn, cons_interview, cons_week) values (seq_consult.nextval, #{proId}, #{stuId}, #{consDate}, #{consStart}, #{consEnd}, #{consReqRsn} ,#{consInterview}, #{consWeek})
mapper.select: select con.cons_num, con.stu_id, stu.stu_name_ko, con.cons_date, con.cons_start, con.cons_end, con.cons_req_rsn, con.cons_status, con.cons_obj_rsn, con.cons_interview, con.cons_week from consult con, student stu where stu.stu_id = con.stu_id and con.cons_status = 'W' and con.pro_id = #{proId} order by con.cons_date desc, con.cons_start desc

select con.cons_num, con.stu_id, stu.stu_name_ko, con.cons_date, con.cons_start, con.cons_end, con.cons_req_rsn, con.cons_status, con.cons_obj_rsn, con.cons_interview, con.cons_week from consult con, student stu where stu.stu_id = con.stu_id and con.cons_status = 'Y' and con.pro_id = #{proId} order by con.cons_date desc, con.cons_start desc

select con.cons_num, con.stu_id, stu.stu_name_ko, con.cons_date, con.cons_start, con.cons_end, con.cons_req_rsn, con.cons_status, con.cons_obj_rsn, con.cons_interview, con.cons_week from consult con, student stu where stu.stu_id = con.stu_id and con.cons_status = 'N' and con.pro_id = #{proId} order by con.cons_date desc, con.cons_start desc
